mapper.select: SELECT t1.FCUSTID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t4.FNAME AS fprimaryGroupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP t3, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID AND t1.FPRIMARYGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID

SELECT t1.FPRIMARYGROUP as number, t4.FNAME AS name FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP t3, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID AND t1.FPRIMARYGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID group by t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t4.FNAME

SELECT t1.FCUSTID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t4.FNAME AS fprimaryGroupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP t3, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID AND t1.FPRIMARYGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID AND t1.FMODIFYDATE > #{maxOutDate}

SELECT t1.FCUSTID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t4.FNAME AS fprimaryGroupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP t3, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID AND t1.FPRIMARYGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID AND t2.FNAME = #{name}
select t2.FNAME FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1 LEFT JOIN T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2 ON t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID where t2.FNAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT t1.FCUSTID, t1.FNUMBER, t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t1.FMODIFYDATE, t2.FNAME FROM T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2 where t1.FCUSTID = t2.FCUSTID and t1.FCUSTID = #{id}

select t1.FCUSTID, t1.FNUMBER, t1.FPRIMARYGROUP, t1.FMODIFYDATE, t2.FNAME, t4.FNAME as fprimaryGroupName from T_BD_CUSTOMER t1, T_BD_CUSTOMER_L t2, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP t3, T_BD_CUSTOMERGROUP_L t4 where t1.FCUSTID=t2.FCUSTID and t1.FPRIMARYGROUP=t3.FID and t3.FID=t4.FID and t1.FPRIMARYGROUP = #{primaryGroup}
select t.FNUMBER from T_BD_ACCOUNT t, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L tl where t.FACCTID=tl.FACCTID and tl.FNAME=#{name}
select t.FNUMBER as number, tl.FNAME as name from T_BD_ACCOUNT t, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L tl where t.FACCTID=tl.FACCTID
